section.name: Security Update List by CVEs
section.p: Here are the known Security Vulnerabilities for Apache UIMA, listed by CVE number.

section.name: Reporting New Security Problems with Apache UIMA
section.p: We strongly encourage people to report new security problems to the private security mailing list of the ASF Security Team, before disclosing them in a public forum.
Please see the page of the AFS Security Team for further information and contact information.

p.b: The Security Team cannot accept regular bug reports or other queries; please use the regular UIMA mailing lists for those.

section.name: Security Standards
section.p: Apache UIMA vulnerabilities are labeled with CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) identifiers.
